statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_data ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_data ORDER BY purchase_date
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_data ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_amount > 1000
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM customer_purchase_data
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 5000
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseData WHERE customer_id = '3d72f32b-3edc-4c5e-981f-66a59d746c5d';
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseData WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseData GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM CustomerPurchaseData WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, count(product_name) AS total_products_purchased FROM CustomerPurchaseData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING count(product_name) > 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseData WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, COUNT(product_name) AS num_products FROM CustomerPurchaseData GROUP BY customer_id, product_name HAVING COUNT(product_name) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseData GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT cpd.customer_id, spd.sustainability_score FROM CustomerPurchaseData cpd JOIN SustainableProductPreferences spd ON cpd.customer_id = spd.customer_id WHERE cpd.quantity > 2;
SELECT * FROM SustainableProductPreferences ORDER BY preference_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products ORDER BY product_category DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE quantity > 3 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_purchase FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_purchase > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase DESC;
SELECT product_category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products GROUP BY product_category HAVING AVG(price) > 30 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM trends WHERE discover_date >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE available = true ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 2 AND purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM trends WHERE discover_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pur ON c.customer_id = pur.customer_id JOIN products p ON pur.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT t.trend_name, t.trend_description, count(pur.purchase_id) as total_purchases FROM trends t LEFT JOIN purchases pur ON t.trend_id = pur.product_id GROUP BY t.trend_name, t.trend_description ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
